raw:
{
  "items": [
    {
      "prompt": "A patient with a spinal cord injury is experiencing difficulty in movement and sensation below the injury site. Explain how the spinal cord functions in relation to this patient's symptoms.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Describes the role of the spinal cord in transmitting signals between the brain and the body.",
        "Explains how injury to the spinal cord can disrupt these signals.",
        "Discusses the impact on motor functions and sensory perception.",
        "Uses relevant terminology (e.g., ascending and descending pathways).",
        "Provides a clear link between the injury and the symptoms experienced.",
        "Concludes with implications for rehabilitation or recovery."
      ]
    },
    {
      "prompt": "A researcher is studying the effects of dopamine on motivation. Describe how dopamine functions in the brain and its relevance to motivation.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Defines dopamine as a neurotransmitter.",
        "Explains its role in the reward pathway of the brain.",
        "Discusses how dopamine influences feelings of pleasure and motivation.",
        "Mentions the relationship between dopamine levels and behaviors.",
        "Provides examples of conditions related to dopamine (e.g., addiction, depression).",
        "Concludes with implications for understanding motivation."
      ]
    },
    {
      "prompt": "A teenager is experiencing heightened anxiety and stress. Discuss how the autonomic nervous system responds to stress and its effects on the body.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Describes the autonomic nervous system and its divisions (sympathetic and parasympathetic).",
        "Explains the 'fight or flight' response initiated by the sympathetic nervous system.",
        "Discusses physiological changes (e.g., increased heart rate, adrenaline release).",
        "Mentions the role of the parasympathetic system in calming the body.",
        "Links the response to the teenager's anxiety and stress levels.",
        "Concludes with potential long-term effects of chronic stress."
      ]
    },
    {
      "prompt": "A scientist is investigating the role of the hypothalamus in regulating body temperature. Explain the functions of the hypothalamus in homeostasis.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Defines homeostasis and its importance for bodily functions.",
        "Describes the location and structure of the hypothalamus.",
        "Explains how the hypothalamus detects changes in body temperature.",
        "Discusses mechanisms the hypothalamus uses to regulate temperature (e.g., sweating, shivering).",
        "Mentions feedback loops involved in maintaining homeostasis.",
        "Concludes with the significance of hypothalamic function for overall health."
      ]
    },
    {
      "prompt": "A patient with Parkinson's disease has difficulty with movement and coordination. Discuss the role of neurotransmitters in this condition.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Identifies dopamine as a key neurotransmitter affected in Parkinson's disease.",
        "Explains how reduced dopamine levels impact motor control.",
        "Describes the role of the basal ganglia in movement regulation.",
        "Discusses symptoms associated with dopamine deficiency (e.g., tremors, rigidity).",
        "Mentions treatment options that target neurotransmitter levels.",
        "Concludes with the broader implications for understanding neurodegenerative diseases."
      ]
    },
    {
      "prompt": "A child is diagnosed with ADHD and prescribed medication that affects norepinephrine levels. Explain the role of norepinephrine in attention and behavior.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Defines norepinephrine as a neurotransmitter.",
        "Explains its role in arousal and alertness.",
        "Discusses how norepinephrine affects attention and focus.",
        "Mentions the relationship between norepinephrine levels and ADHD symptoms.",
        "Describes how medication can help regulate these neurotransmitter levels.",
        "Concludes with implications for behavioral management in ADHD."
      ]
    },
    {
      "prompt": "A researcher is studying the effects of sleep deprivation on cognitive function. Discuss the biological mechanisms involved in sleep and its importance for brain health.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Describes the stages of sleep (REM and non-REM).",
        "Explains the role of sleep in memory consolidation and learning.",
        "Discusses the impact of sleep deprivation on neurotransmitter levels.",
        "Mentions physiological changes that occur during sleep.",
        "Links sleep to overall brain health and cognitive performance.",
        "Concludes with potential long-term effects of chronic sleep deprivation."
      ]
    },
    {
      "prompt": "A person experiences a traumatic event and develops PTSD. Explain the role of the amygdala in the processing of fear and trauma.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Identifies the amygdala as a key brain structure in emotion regulation.",
        "Explains its role in processing fear responses.",
        "Discusses how the amygdala interacts with other brain regions (e.g., hippocampus, prefrontal cortex).",
        "Describes the impact of trauma on amygdala functioning.",
        "Links amygdala activity to symptoms of PTSD.",
        "Concludes with implications for treatment approaches targeting the amygdala."
      ]
    },
    {
      "prompt": "A scientist is studying the effects of chronic stress on the brain. Discuss how stress hormones affect brain structure and function.",
      "max": 6,
      "markscheme": [
        "Identifies key stress hormones (e.g., cortisol).",
        "Explains how these hormones affect the brain during stress.",
        "Discusses the impact of chronic stress on brain structures (
